channel.title: Speaker Recognition on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Speaker Recognition on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Annealed Multiple Choice Learning: Overcoming limitations of Winner-takes-all with annealing
item.description: Annealed Multiple Choice Learning (aMCL) overcomes limitations of Winner-takes-all in multiple choice learning by using annealing, improving robustness and performance.

item.title: SLIM: Style-Linguistics Mismatch Model for Generalized Audio Deepfake Detection
item.description: SLIM: A novel audio deepfake detection model leverages style-linguistics mismatch for superior generalization and explainability.
